actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare with amendment, S. Rept. 93-777.

official_title: A bill to extend the Environmental Education Act for three years.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Environmental Education Amendments - Provides that in the development of curricula regarding the environment under the Environmental Education Act due consideration be given to the economic implications of environmental protection. Adds to the definition of "environmental education" for the purposes of the Environmental Education Act, the relation of economic impact to the total human environment. Provides that the Advisory Council on Environmental Education shall continue to exist until July 1, 1977. Authorizes to be appropriated $5,000,000 for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, $10,000,000 for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and $15,000,000 for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1977, to carry out the purposes of the Environmental Education Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Environmental Education Act for three years.
